attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT charges relief for the first 5 years when a small business is starting regardless how good it could perform so that the relief hence improved cashflow could help small business survive and grow and that is always vital for a small business to succeed.  And reduction on Vat to 10% after the first 5 years and is chargeble progressively according to the levels of profits.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
